p: In contrast to the diagnostic samples, there were significant differences ( P < 0.05) in the Se of the different air samplers when used in close proximity to calves. The cyclone, AirPort-MD8, and May samplers, which had the highest air sampling rates, had the highest Se (Se of >0.7) during the preclinical phase. The BioBadge air sampler was shown to have the lowest Se ( Fig. 3b).
